title: Designing Learning Data Augmentation Strategies for Intelligent Tutoring Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational machine learning knowledge, experience with Intelligent Tutoring Systems (ITS), and domain expertise in social sciences
context.additional_context: Customized data augmentation practice utilizing learner-specific BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environments.

learning_goals: Learners can visualize learning performance data using 3D tensor structures

Proposing a social-domain ITS learning data augmentation framework as a project deliverable
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
